divs: sighting detailsthis was before i knew about sfo's i was making a night crossing to catalina island. i had hit it a little east of two harbors so i headed west. about 10 min going west, and all of a sudden the ocean lit up like a built in pool about 100 yards on both sides of me. now im a night scuba diver and know how light goes under water, but this was differant, the light was in a perfect square, besides the ocean lighting up right under my boat, the light being in a square seemed odd to me. it only lasted about 15 sec, but when i reached two harbors, it seemed like i lost 2 hours, it was very late and i never thought much about the time then. remember, i never saw an object, just a bright light. it wasn't untill a couple of years latter i learned about sfo's. great job you guys are doing, the truth will come out if you keep this up. [last name removed cms\dr]
trends: There have been no other sightings in Catalina Island
This sighting has never been favorited.
